p: The keywords in the SARS-MERS antiviral therapy section included keywords related to SARS-CoV and MERS-CoV in combination with standard filters for clinical trials. Similar to the previous section, keywords related to antiviral therapy were not included in the search, due to the limited number of studies. The time range for search was set to be from the inception of the database until March 15, 2020. Search strategy in Medline is presented in Table 1. In addition to the systematic search, an extensive search was also performed on google and google scholar search engines and in the article bibliographies.
